definition: after all/to investigate/to study carefully/Taiwan pr. [jiu4]
actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]

Bei3 jing1 he2 wu3 qi4 yan2 jiu1 suo3

sentences.english: The cases have been laboratory confirmed by the Institut Pasteur, Dakar.
sentences.chinese: 这些病例已得到达喀尔巴斯德研究所的实验室确认。

sentences.english: The research was conducted in rhesus monkeys, which are considered an excellent model of human drug users.
sentences.chinese: 研究所用的恒河猴被认为是人类药瘾者的良好模型。

sentences.english: The institute called the policy “a resounding success.
sentences.chinese: 卡托研究所称这个政策是“一场彻底的胜利。”

sentences.english: Ray Cheung is a senior associate at the World Resources Institute's Markets and Enterprise Program.
sentences.chinese: 张智康，世界资源研究所市场与企业项目高级助理。

sentences.english: Before, Shenyin Wanguo Research Institute that is a special report on the Margin analysis .

sentences.english: The current director is Professor Wang Keqiang.
sentences.chinese: 研究所所长为王克强教授。

sentences.english: What is the Berkeley Earth Surface Temperature study?

sentences.english: He is now a researcher at Instiute For Arts & Literature Trend of People's University of China.
sentences.chinese: 现任中国人民大学文艺思潮研究所研究员。

sentences.english: This Institute immediately recognized Renee as a sensitive.
sentences.chinese: 该研究所立即承认蕾妮作为一个敏感的。

sentences.english: The examined specimens are deposited in the Institute of Entomology, Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 研究标本保存于沈阳师范大学昆虫研究所。

sentences.english: Last year the district was awarded a Confucious Institute to support the Chinese language programs.
sentences.chinese: 去年该地区设立孔子研究所，支持中国语言教学计划。

sentences.english: Comparative National Institute of Health expenditure on tobacco compared with other health problems.
sentences.chinese: 比较国家烟草研究所与支出相比其他健康问题的健康。

sentences.english: This is the website for Institute of Oceanology, PAS .
sentences.chinese: 这是波兰科学院海洋研究所的网站。

sentences.english: The research instrument of this study is available for checking who is an internet addict.

sentences.english: They argue the institute, which will occupy a former divinity school building, is a totem to the late Friedman who they call a dinosaur of economic thought.
sentences.chinese: 他们声称这个研究所是已故弗里德曼的图腾。

sentences.english: That’s according the International Institute for Species Exploration at Arizona State University. [http://species.asu.edu/Top10]
